Texts.Chs: 在^orange;熔炉^reset;处制造^orange;10张纸^reset;并带给^green;韦尔奇^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Craft ^orange;10 Paper^reset; at a ^orange;Furnace^reset; and return to ^green;Welchie^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 我有个小建议：你可以在一处^orange;熔炉^reset;制造^orange;纸张^reset;！我想要^orange;10^reset;张。我准备给我所爱的人写几封信。
Texts.Eng: I've got a tip for you: You can make ^orange;Paper^reset; in a ^orange;Furnace^reset;! I could use say, ^orange;10^reset; pieces. I'm fixin' to write some letters to loved ones.

Texts.Chs: 看起来不是很多...但是当你最不期待的时候，纸就会派上用场。 此外，不管电脑能让东西看起来多么漂亮，它都是写作的好材料。
Texts.Eng: It may not seem like much...but paper will come in handy when yer least expectin' it. Besides, it's great for writin', no matter how pretty a computer can make things look.
